report.title: Good Stuff
report.author: Heath
report.bodytext: I'm a typical stimulant fiend due to general lethargy (otherwise known as being a lazy ass). /n /n For me, I don't think a person could measure any significant cognitive enhancements with this stuff. It has other major benefits though. /n /n -- Seems to totally prevent hangovers /n -- Counters irritablility and lack of creativity caused be other simulants /n -- Enhances sensory perception /n -- Large powder quantities available for cheap /n /n It's strange. I have mediocre vision. When I first started taking the stuff I could have sworn that my vision had improved. /n /n Very clean, relaxing feeling. Makes me feel like a hippy, which isn't as bad as I imagined. =) /n /n Peace
